summary.description: A technical, 1-sentence summary of the product. No conversational filler.

gaps.description: Identified product gaps or user pain points.

story.description: Story in 'As a... I want... so that...' format.

ui_multi_section.description: Whether the UI has multiple sections

assumptions.description: Array of assumptions about the project.

out_of_scope.description: Array of items explicitly out of scope.

user_stories.title: Biometric Authentication
user_stories.story: As a user, I want to log in using FaceID or Fingerprint so that I can access my account securely without typing a password.
user_stories.description: Implement React Native biometric libraries linked to Node.js auth tokens. Fallback to PIN required.
acceptance_criteria: User can enable FaceID/TouchID in settings
Successful biometric scan logs user in
Three failed attempts prompt for PIN/Password

user_stories.title: Real-time Account Dashboard
user_stories.story: As a user, I want to view my account balance and recent transactions so that I know my current financial standing.
user_stories.description: Fetch balance and last 5 transactions from PostgreSQL via secure API endpoint.
acceptance_criteria: Balance is formatted with currency symbol

user_stories.title: Internal Money Transfer
user_stories.story: As a user, I want to transfer funds between my accounts so that I can manage my money distribution.
user_stories.description: Transactional logic in Node.js ensuring ACID compliance in PostgreSQL.
acceptance_criteria: User selects source and destination accounts

user_stories.title: Savings Goal Tracker
user_stories.story: As a user, I want to set a savings goal and track progress so that I can save for specific purchases.
user_stories.description: CRUD operations for savings goals with visual progress bars in UI.
acceptance_criteria: User can create a goal with name and amount
Progress bar updates as funds are allocated

user_stories.title: Transaction Push Notifications
user_stories.story: As a user, I want to receive alerts for account activity so that I can detect unauthorized usage immediately.
user_stories.description: Integration with Firebase Cloud Messaging triggered by backend events.
acceptance_criteria: Alert sent for debits over defined threshold
Deep link takes user to transaction details

acceptance_criteria.criteria: All financial data must be encrypted at rest using AES-256.
acceptance_criteria.description: Database level encryption for sensitive columns.
acceptance_criteria.title: Data Encryption

acceptance_criteria.criteria: API responses must complete within 500ms for 95% of requests.
acceptance_criteria.title: API Latency

acceptance_criteria.criteria: Application must comply with GDPR and local banking regulations.
acceptance_criteria.description: Data retention and deletion policies implemented.
acceptance_criteria.title: Regulatory Compliance

acceptance_criteria.criteria: UI must support dynamic text sizing for accessibility.
acceptance_criteria.title: Accessibility

content.summary: A secure, cross-platform digital banking app built on React Native and Node.js offering real-time financial management and regulatory compliance.
content.description: This product modernizes personal finance by providing a secure mobile banking experience. It integrates real-time transaction tracking, biometric security, and financial wellness tools like budgeting and savings goals, backed by a robust Node.js/PostgreSQL architecture ensuring data integrity.
assumptions: Users possess smartphones with biometric hardware.
Third-party banking APIs are available for core banking core integration.
Regulatory approval is granted for the target launch region.

gaps.impact: Users must use other apps to check credit health.
Cannot view cached balance without internet.

parts.text:
{
  "user_stories": [
    {
      "title": "Biometric Authentication",
      "story": "As a user, I want to log in using FaceID or Fingerprint so that I can access my account securely without typing a password.",
      "description": "Implement React Native biometric libraries linked to Node.js auth tokens. Fallback to PIN required.",
      "priority": "critical",
      "story_points": 3,
      "acceptance_criteria": [
        "User can enable FaceID/TouchID in settings",
        "Successful biometric scan logs user in",
        "Three failed attempts prompt for PIN/Password"
      ],
      "estimated_complexity": "medium",
      "user_value": "High security and convenience",
      "dependencies": [],
      "id": "US-1"
    },
    {
      "title": "Real-time Account Dashboard",
      "story": "As a user, I want to view my account balance and recent transactions so that I know my current financial standing.",
      "description": "Fetch balance and last 5 transactions from PostgreSQL via secure API endpoint.",
      "priority": "critical",
      "story_points": 5,
      "acceptance_criteria": [
        "Dashboard loads within 2 seconds",
        "Balance is formatted with currency symbol",
        "Pull-to-refresh updates data"
      ],
      "estimated_complexity": "medium",
      "user_value": "Immediate financial awareness",
      "dependencies": [
        "US-1"
      ],
      "id": "US-2"
    },
    {
      "title": "Internal Money Transfer",
      "story": "As a user, I want to transfer funds between my accounts so that I can manage my money distribution.",
      "description": "Transactional logic in Node.js ensuring ACID compliance in PostgreSQL.",
      "priority": "high",
      "story_points": 8,
      "acceptance_criteria": [
        "User selects source and destination accounts",
        "System validates sufficient funds",
        "Transaction record created immediately"
      ],
      "estimated_complexity": "large",
      "user_value": "Fund management flexibility",
      "dependencies": [
        "US-2"
      ],
      "id": "US-3"
    },
    {
      "title": "Savings Goal Tracker",
      "story": "As a user, I want to set a savings goal and track progress so that I can save for specific purchases.",
      "description": "CRUD operations for savings goals with visual progress bars in UI.",
      "priority": "medium",
      "story_points": 5,
      "acceptance_criteria": [
        "User can create a goal with name and amount",
        "Progress bar updates as funds are allocated",
        "Notification sent when goal reached"
      ],
      "estimated_complexity": "medium",
      "user_value": "Financial wellness motivation",
      "dependencies": [
        "US-2"
      ],
      "id": "US-4"
    },
    {
      "title": "Transaction Push Notifications",
      "story": "As a user, I want to receive alerts for account activity so that I can detect unauthorized usage immediately.",
      "description": "Integration with Firebase Cloud Messaging triggered by backend events.",
      "priority": "medium",
      "story_points": 3,
      "acceptance_criteria": [
        "Alert sent for debits over defined threshold",
        "User can toggle notifications on/off",
        "Deep link takes user to transaction details"
      ],
      "estimated_complexity": "small",
      "user_value": "Security and awareness",
      "dependencies": [
        "US-1"
      ],
      "id": "US-5"
    }
  ],
  "acceptance_criteria": [
    {
      "criteria": "All financial data must be encrypted at rest using AES-256.",
      "description": "Database level encryption for sensitive columns.",
      "id": "AC-1",
      "priority": "must",
      "title": "Data Encryption"
    },
    {
      "criteria": "API responses must complete within 500ms for 95% of requests.",
      "description": "Performance benchmark for backend endpoints.",
      "id": "AC-2",
      "priority": "should",
      "title": "API Latency"
    },
    {
      "criteria": "Application must comply with GDPR and local banking regulations.",
      "description": "Data retention and deletion policies implemented.",
      "id": "AC-3",
      "priority": "must",
      "title": "Regulatory Compliance"
    },
    {
      "criteria": "UI must support dynamic text sizing for accessibility.",
      "description": "React Native accessibility props implementation.",
      "id": "AC-4",
      "priority": "should",
      "title": "Accessibility"
    }
  ],
  "summary": "A secure, cross-platform digital banking app built on React Native and Node.js offering real-time financial management and regulatory compliance.",
  "description": "This product modernizes personal finance by providing a secure mobile banking experience. It integrates real-time transaction tracking, biometric security, and financial wellness tools like budgeting and savings goals, backed by a robust Node.js/PostgreSQL architecture ensuring data integrity.",
  "assumptions": [
    "Users possess smartphones with biometric hardware.",
    "Third-party banking APIs are available for core banking core integration.",
    "Regulatory approval is granted for the target launch region.",
    "Users have consistent internet connectivity."
  ],
  "out_of_scope": [
    "Cryptocurrency trading and wallet management.",
    "Loan origination and underwriting workflows.",
    "Physical branch locator services.",
    "Joint account management for MVP."
  ],
  "swot": {
    "strengths": [
      "Modern Tech Stack (RN/Node)",
      "Low operational overhead",
      "High security focus",
      "Cross-platform codebase"
    ],
    "weaknesses": [
      "New market entrant trust issues",
      "No physical branch network",
      "Dependency on 3rd party banking core"
    ],
    "opportunities": [
      "AI-driven financial advice",
      "Gamification of savings",
      "Partnerships with fintechs",
      "Expansion to SME banking"
    ],
    "threats": [
      "Established traditional banks",
      "Changing banking regulations",
      "Cybersecurity attacks",
      "Market saturation"
    ]
  },
  "stakeholders": [
    {
      "role": "Product Owner",
      "interest": "ROI and Feature Delivery",
      "influence": "high"
    },
    {
      "role": "Compliance Officer",
      "interest": "Regulatory Adherence",
      "influence": "high"
    },
    {
      "role": "Lead Developer",
      "interest": "Technical Feasibility",
      "influence": "medium"
    },
    {
      "role": "End User",
      "interest": "Usability and Security",
      "influence": "low"
    }
  ],
  "invest_analysis": [
    {
      "user_story_id": "US-1",
      "independent": true,
      "negotiable": true,
      "valuable": true,
      "estimatable": true,
      "small": true,
      "testable": true,
      "score": 10,
      "comments": "Standard implementation."
    },
    {
      "user_story_id": "US-2",
      "independent": false,
      "negotiable": true,
      "valuable": true,
      "estimatable": true,
      "small": true,
      "testable": true,
      "score": 8,
      "comments": "Depends on Auth."
    },
    {
      "user_story_id": "US-3",
      "independent": false,
      "negotiable": true,
      "valuable": true,
      "estimatable": true,
      "small": false,
      "testable": true,
      "score": 7,
      "comments": "Complex logic involved."
    },
    {
      "user_story_id": "US-4",
      "independent": true,
      "negotiable": true,
      "valuable": true,
      "estimatable": true,
      "small": true,
      "testable": true,
      "score": 9,
      "comments": "Good standalone feature."
    },
    {
      "user_story_id": "US-5",
      "independent": true,
      "negotiable": true,
      "valuable": true,
      "estimatable": true,
      "small": true,
      "testable": true,
      "score": 9,
      "comments": "High user value."
    }
  ],
  "gaps": [
    {
      "gap": "Credit Score Tracking",
      "impact": "Users must use other apps to check credit health.",
      "priority": "medium"
    },
    {
      "gap": "Offline Mode",
      "impact": "Cannot view cached balance without internet.",
      "priority": "low"
    }
  ],
  "opportunities": [
    {
      "opportunity": "AI Chatbot Support",
      "value": "Reduces customer support costs.",
      "feasibility": "medium"
    },
    {
      "opportunity": "Investment Integration",
      "value": "Increases user retention and LTV.",
      "feasibility": "low"
    }
  ],
  "ui_multi_section": true
}
